summary: Fully voiced Follower, she comments on new areas, during fights, and in certain towns. she also has some dialogue options. She is not romanceable, but in future she maybe. you will find her in Whiterun in Drunken Huntsman
descriptionHtml:
Fully voiced Follower, she comments on new areas, during fights, and in certain towns. she also has some dialogue options. She is not romanceable, but in future she maybe. you will find her in Whiterun in Drunken Huntsman. She has her own gear (Ebony Armour, and Her own sword). She is a nord, but she will tell you that herself. No mods required, no Dlc required for her.

INSTALL INSTRUCTION: Extract to the C:Program Files (x86)SteamSteamAppscommonSkyrimData (or whereever your Skyrim install folder is) OR use the NMM To download the files and it will put it there for you



IMPORTANT: If you talk to her and nothing happens, just save it and reload and she should work fine. If for some reason the mod doesnt work properly, download steam version here : http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=249284372

Will keep updating this until i feel she is complete

Feedback is greatly appreciated, i like constructive crtitisim so tell me what you think of this project, and what you would like added

thanks
author: chibievil
